channel.title: Combined Politepol Feed
channel.description: Merged feed from multiple Politepol sources

item.title: Mulayam Singh Yadav’s son wants to divorce ‘family destroyer’ wife, Aparna Yadav: Who is she?
1 year of Trump 2.0: From tariffs to Venezuela, how US president shook global order
What to expect from India’s largest-ever delegation at Davos 2026
Inside the sex and drug racket run by Indian-origin couple from motel in US
‘Looks like horror movie’: How two high-speed trains crashed in Spain, killing 39
India invited to Trump’s Gaza ‘Board of Peace’: How will this body function?
How Chabahar is India’s first test of strategic resolve in 2026
item.description: Chabahar Port is not merely an infrastructure project but a symbol of India’s strategic requirements in the extended neighbourhood and a symbol of India’s strategic autonomy. India cannot afford to look weak and relent under pressure

item.title: How India-EU ties gain renewed relevance in a turbulent world
item.description: In a multipolar, interdependent world of constant global churn, India and Europe can maximise leverage by capitalising on each other’s strengths and growth potential

item.title: In a world of ‘might is right’: Could Japan, South Korea go nuclear?
item.description: Regional threats and doubts about the reliability of extended deterrence are pushing technically capable non-nuclear states like Japan and South Korea to consider developing nuclear weapons

item.title: Why US intervention in Iran would be a mistake
item.description: There is no plan for the day after. The disgruntled Iranian diaspora and global media organisations joined the Western chorus against the conservative Islamic regime, as if bombing Iran could effect any credible change—other than causing more mayhem and destruction

item.title: From Delhi to Piprahwa: Rediscovering Buddha’s sacred gems
item.description: The set of 349 gems, returned to India after more than a century, connects the grandeur of ancient Buddhist heritage with the present, making the Piprahwa stupa a spiritual and historical focal point

item.title: From Venezuela to Greenland: How Trump is playing deep state playbook to counter China
item.description: Trump is playing an old geopolitical game on a relatively new playground: only, he is a better showman and entertainer
